Text: Does this one have the new remastered sound or the old classic mono sound. When Arnie shots with his gun, does it sound "doff doff doff", or is it more like "pekoo pekoo pekoo"? I would love to get my hands on the old one!
Interesting sound effects muchomacho. haha. I too prefer the more realistic popping sounds of the original. That's what guns actually sound like.
